  • Constructor Details

    • adverb

      public adverb​(java.lang.String type)
      This creates a adverb and sets the word for the adverb. Takes methods from both verb and baseSpeech. Overall most of the important stuff happens in the baseSpeech class. Super calls the extend class verb.
      See Also:
      noun, baseSpeech

    • adverb

      public adverb()
